segments.text: Peeking into the kitchen, I see the everyday routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is at the sink area, handling a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet's on and overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's sheeting down the front, pooling below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's climbing the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's tippingâ€”heart in my mouth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is eager, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem thrilled with their secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make noise and alert her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a pretty garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mix of calm and chaos is intriguing.
segments.speaker: PAR
